Articles.Content:
We've brought the hype to the....

danger zone.

![tumblr_inline_n2wzcwbrOJ1snq6pm.gif](https://31.media.tumblr.com/ea4d5b0539ad0e3bfe87756c13dc7f7f/tumblr_inline_n2wzcwbrOJ1snq6pm.gif)

please don't hurt me

> 
> Looks like they consolidated them with that one.
> \*watches Das get tsunami'd by questions\*
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> DANGIT! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> 
> Not even in debug menu? Doing deltaV seriously doesn't seem like a hard thing to do.

He sounded pretty confident in his answer, but he hasn't checked the debug menu yet.

Posts are coming in at a rate between 1-3 min. This is just barley orbital speed!

HYPE ON!
There's a new forum giveaway!

Engage the hype shuttle

rep to anyone who can tell me what series and season, then episode

![The_Intrepid.PNG](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/archer/images/5/53/The_Intrepid.PNG)

- - - Updated - - -

Giveaway is [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116628-A-very-special-gift-from-Shapeways!?p=1861392#post1861392)!

They just released another one for linux on SteamDB.

I wonder what they're doing?

Another...

Release

Experimentals

QA

Scratchpad

What Branch?
Wait, another DB update? What's it on this time?

> 
> Another...
> Release
> 
> Experimentals
> 
> QA
> 
> Scratchpad
> 
> What Branch?

Its likely the final testing branch.

> 
> Its likely the final testing branch.

Finals testing... Thanks for reminding me about my school work ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Another...
> Release
> 
> Experimentals
> 
> QA
> 
> Scratchpad
> 
> What Branch?

The two most recent as of right now are scratchpad.

Anybody familiar with the experiemntials proccess know what the scratchpad thing is? Seems like it might be a 'in testing' bit of code or a 'lets try this out'.
PC and Linux just went to scratchpad. I remember that happening a few updates ago, wasn't it a bad thing?

If it goes to scratch pad it's the immediate testing phase... we might be looking at an early release

(i hope so much)

> 
> If it goes to scratch pad it's the immediate testing phase... we might be looking at an early release
> (i hope so much)

Nah, I think they should use as much time as they've got.

If they finish a bit early, okay cool.

> 
> If it goes to scratch pad it's the immediate testing phase... we might be looking at an early release
> (i hope so much)

Definitely not an early release, they will spend every last minute trying to find and fix bugs. (*I hope*)

I'm gettin' pretty hyped for the release - still only about 80%, but that's the highest it's been in a long time.

Come on, 1.0~ release dammit~

It seems that there's not glitches. Plus, it's so big I'll be lucky to have it downloaded by friday with all this traffic that's bound to come.

- - - Updated - - -

We just hyped the forums to the town of Database. Population: Error

> 
> It seems that there's not glitches. Plus, it's so big I'll be lucky to have it downloaded by friday with all this traffic that's bound to come.

Meh. Buy the Steam edition. Steam won't even notice the release, unlike that multiplay.co.uk thing that hosts the store that melts down if more than one person downloads at once (modern broadband connections are a bit much for their dual bonded E1 line it seems).

It's not like KSP isn't worth the money... Seriously, most AAA games these days are between 4 and 16 hours and cost like seventy bucks, vs hundreds to thousands to tens of thousands of hours in KSP for thirty bucks. Sure, it might have warts, Squad might screw the pooch on every other opportunity, but it's still highly playable.

Anyhow, with the Steam edition, you can board the download hypetrain!
How many hours do you think guys?
Das is screwing around with the new aerodynamic GUI, which looks pretty awesome actually.

I just ran my patcher... i saw 1.0 someplace in it...

i think i'm somehow downloading 1.0 right now

Proof:

![6Mr5.png](http://i.picresize.com/images/2015/04/26/6Mr5.png)

WOO! HYPE! Resource, aero, new wings, landing gear, heatshields, fairings, SRBs, Awesome things!
